body.p: As AI and large language models (LLMs) increasingly interact with websites, a key challenge is giving them direct access to relevant content. Together, llms.txt and companion Markdown (.md) files provide LLMs with a clean, simplified view of site content and a curated index of the most relevant resources. By setting the parameter, these files will automatically be generated in the output directory.
